overview: Nikky Tyler and Joey Silvera fell into it as easy as the fell out of it. Love, that is. And now, as they sit in the attorney's office, remembering the way it was, we remember the erotic moments... and the explosive passion that brought them together. Join Nikki Tyler in a role filled with the tender fury of a fiery chemistry... Out of Love. If you have to fall, you have definitely landed in the right place.
tagline: Think of it as falling out.
title: Out of Love
